system.availability: A Pistol like mechanism with a Fist-Sized top that can be fired with a +0 Tech-Use Test. If successful the top can go up to 600m, typically straight up. Displays surroundings from vantage point. Provides +20 to Navigate (Surface), Survival (Tracking), and Scrutiny Tests. Can stay airborne for up to 5 hours before needing recharge. Can return to its base at any time, does so within one turn.
system.cost: Device provides 3D Holographic display of area when active, can see Kilometres in all directions, turn with the user, and zoom/highlight selected locations
